[al:Legends Never Die (Explicit)]

[00:00.00]Titanic (Explicit) - Juice WRLD
[00:03.40]Lyrics by：Rex Kudo/Jarad Higgins/Dwan Avery
[00:06.80]Composed by：Rex Kudo/Jarad Higgins/Dwan Avery
[00:10.21]DY definitely Krazy
[00:11.18]Abandon all ships it's about to go down
[00:13.75]I'm Titanic
[00:15.35]Titanic
[00:16.45]There's a lot going on in my head right now
[00:19.16]But I manage
[00:20.84]But I manage
[00:21.99]Good heart good soul both been in bad hands
[00:24.76]I can deal damage
[00:26.20]Yeah real damage
[00:27.48]Both hands in the air as I scream out prayers
[00:30.24]My demons show their face in the midnight air
[00:32.94]Just got a new house gotta hide the skeletons in the closet
[00:36.55]And keep 'em there really tryna forget about 'em
[00:39.37]They tell me God watchin' over me I don't doubt it
[00:41.97]But I can see 'em gettin' tired of me sinnin' and wildin'
[00:44.95]Don't know what to do with myself these days
[00:47.68]Young rich n***a I done fell in love with the pain
[00:50.07]But all this money don't rid me of my pain
[00:53.06]But everywhere I go I could make it precipitate rain
[00:56.08]F**ked up I did
[00:58.84]F**ked up I am
[01:01.60]Come down I can't
[01:04.11]S**t here we go again
[01:06.32]Abandon all ships it's about to go down
[01:08.91]I'm Titanic
[01:10.59]Titanic
[01:11.78]There's a lot going on in my head right now
[01:14.39]But I manage
[01:15.88]But I manage
[01:17.14]Good heart good soul both been in bad hands
[01:19.85]I can deal damage
[01:21.36]Yeah real damage
[01:22.62]Both hands in the air as I scream out prayers
[01:25.38]My demons show their face in the midnight air
[01:28.18]Set sail in the codeine bottle I'ma drown in it drown in it
[01:32.96]S**t fills me up but whatever goes up goes down in it down in it
[01:38.51]At the end of the day I'm blessed
[01:40.61]Oh yes crack a smile with it smile with it
[01:44.10]Now frownin' again life goes so fast watch it blow in the wind
[01:48.15]Can't get time back I been beggin' for it
[01:51.30]F**ked up I did
[01:53.88]Oh f**ked up I am
[01:56.87]Here we go again
[01:59.64]Here we go again
[02:01.64]Abandon all ships it's about to go down
[02:04.02]I'm Titanic
[02:05.70]Titanic
[02:06.73]There's a lot going on in my head right now
[02:09.55]But I manage
[02:11.04]But I manage
[02:12.29]Good heart good soul both been in bad hands
[02:15.06]I can deal damage
[02:16.41]Yeah real damage
[02:17.91]Both hands in the air as I scream out prayers
[02:20.37]My demons show their face in the midnight air
[02:25.09]Midnight air midnight air
[02:30.53]Midnight air
[02:31.96]Midnight air
[02:33.30]I'ma drown in here
[02:36.08]Midnight air
[02:37.52]Midnight air
[02:38.65]It's in the midnight air
[02:41.51]I'ma drown in it no Titanic Titanic
data.trans:
[ti:Titanic (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Legends Never Die (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.40]//
[00:06.80]//
[00:10.21]DY Krazy制作
[00:11.18]遗弃所有船只 几近沉没
[00:13.75]我犹如泰坦尼克号
[00:15.35]泰坦尼克号
[00:16.45]此刻我脑海里思绪万千
[00:19.16]可我咬牙坚持
[00:20.84]可我咬牙坚持
[00:21.99]善良的心 真诚的灵魂落入坏人的手中
[00:24.76]我可以抚慰创伤
[00:26.20]给我留下不可磨灭的伤害
[00:27.48]高举双手 当我高声祈祷
[00:30.24]我心底的恶魔在午夜的天空显露真容
[00:32.94]我刚买下一栋新房子 把不可告人的秘密藏在其中
[00:36.55]将它们封存于此 我竭力忘记这些秘密
[00:39.37]他们告诉我 上帝守护着我 我深信不疑
[00:41.97]可我明白他们对我的罪孽和狂妄忍无可忍
[00:44.95]这些日子我手足无措
[00:47.68]年轻有为 我对这痛苦欲罢不能
[00:50.07]然而金钱无法让我忘却痛苦
[00:53.06]无论我走到哪里 我可以呼风唤雨
[00:56.08]我搞砸了一切
[00:58.84]我糟糕透顶
[01:01.60]我无法冷静下来
[01:04.11]该死 我重蹈覆辙
[01:06.32]遗弃所有船只 几近沉没
[01:08.91]我犹如泰坦尼克号
[01:10.59]泰坦尼克号
[01:11.78]此刻我脑海里思绪万千
[01:14.39]可我咬牙坚持
[01:15.88]可我咬牙坚持
[01:17.14]善良的心 真诚的灵魂落入坏人的手中
[01:19.85]我可以抚慰创伤
[01:21.36]给我留下不可磨灭的伤害
[01:22.62]高举双手 当我高声祈祷
[01:25.38]我心底的恶魔在午夜的天空显露真容
[01:28.18]我对那玩意欲罢不能 沉溺其中
[01:32.96]我心烦意乱 人生总是跌宕起伏 难以掌控
[01:38.51]归根到底 我很幸福
[01:40.61]展露笑颜 微笑面对
[01:44.10]现在我眉头紧锁 时光飞逝 看着一切随风飘荡
[01:48.15]尽管我苦苦哀求 可我无法让时光倒流
[01:51.30]我搞砸了一切
[01:53.88]我糟糕透顶
[01:56.87]我重蹈覆辙
[01:59.64]我重蹈覆辙
[02:01.64]遗弃所有船只 几近沉没
[02:04.02]我犹如泰坦尼克号
[02:05.70]泰坦尼克
[02:06.73]此刻我脑海里思绪万千
[02:09.55]可我咬牙坚持
[02:11.04]可我咬牙坚持

[02:25.09]午夜的天空 午夜的天空
[02:30.53]午夜的天空
[02:31.96]午夜的天空
[02:33.30]我在此沉沦
[02:36.08]午夜的天空
[02:37.52]午夜的天空
[02:38.65]在午夜的天空下
[02:41.51]我如同泰坦尼克号一般沉沦
